attributes.action: prosecute any MP that has been found to deliberately claim false expenses for fraud or any other criminal offence that is relevent!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If any person in the UK was to claim false expenses totalling thousands of pounds from their employer they would be prosecuted under criminal law for fraud. What makes MP's different? 

I am their employer, they are my employee!

I demand that they are prosecuted as they have stolen from me personally. I have to pay higher taxes on the items I purchase to pay for 'my company's' (the government) 'overheads'. So inadvertently I am being stolen from as these 'overheads' are not of genuine cause.

rejection.details: Government cannot prosecute individuals or organisations. It is the role of the police to investigate suspected crimes, and the role of the Crown Prosecution Service to decide whether there is a case to answer, and to prosecute.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
